member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXA
member.summary: The ENUMLOGFONTEX structure contains information about an enumerated font.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXA.elfLogFont
member.summary: A structure that contains values defining the font attributes.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXA.elfFullName
member.summary: The unique name of the font. For example, ABC Font Company TrueType Bold Italic Sans Serif.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXA.elfStyle
member.summary: The style of the font. For example, Bold Italic.

member.name: ENUMLOGFONTEXA.elfScript
member.summary: The script, that is, the character set, of the font. For example, Cyrillic.
